title: User sees correct MLS on the payroll report utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating/viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks save or View
custom_expected: THEN each player's MLS is captured according tot he selected "As of date" and displayed in the utility correctly.

title: Print Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for printing an MJC
AND MJC has been saved at least once
AND "Print" button is visible on the MJC
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to select whether they wish to Print Terms or Print Contract
AND selecting "Print Contract" will generate a pdf of the contract

title: Print info section of Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view and print major league contracts
AND the user has navigated to a major league contract
AND the Print split button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print on the MJC
custom_expected: THEN "Info" section of the contract screen should be accurately reflected in the printed contract

title: Print Major League Comp section of Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view and print major league contracts
AND the user has navigated to a major league contract
AND the Print split button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print on the MJC
custom_expected: THEN "Major League Compensation" section of the contract screen should be accurately reflected in the printed contract

title: Print Minor League Comp section of Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view and print major league contracts
AND the user has navigated to a major league contract
AND the Print split button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print on the MJC
custom_expected: THEN "Minor League Compensation" section of the contract screen should be accurately reflected in the printed contract

title: Print Options section of Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view and print major league contracts
AND the user has navigated to a major league contract
AND the Print split button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print on the MJC
custom_expected: THEN "Options" section of the contract screen should be accurately reflected in the printed contract

title: See Submenu when hover over left navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into ebis
custom_steps: WHEN they hover over a left nav item
custom_expected:
THEN the item should highlight 
AND a submenu should display which consists of the dashboard tabs 
AND users should not see a left nav item for which they cannot view any tabs

title: Advanced search filters sorted alphabetically
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing advanced search
custom_steps: WHEN they view a list of filters
custom_expected:
THEN the default sort is alphabetically 
AND the default selection is not the first in the dropdown

title: Navigation Updates to Left nav
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigating through the Left Nav
custom_expected:
THEN order of left nav should be: Rosters, Transactions, Major Contracts, Minor Contracts, Domestic Amateur, System Dates, Utilities 
AND "System Admin" Should be renamed "System Dates" 
AND "Batches" should be moved to "Utilities" 
AND "LRD" should be moved to "Utilities" 
AND "Bulletin" should be renamed "Daily Trans Bulletin" 
AND "Disabled List" should be renamed "Disabled List/Rehab"
AND "Recertification" should be renamed "DL Recertification"

title: Navigation Updates to Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user if viewing a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the tabs should appear in the following order: 
Player History, Info, Contracts, Transactions, International (only displays for Intl players), Draft/Scouting, Service, Stats

title: Award Entry Permissions -BOC Read
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a an MJC BOC Read only account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Award Entry
custom_expected: THEN they will only be able to view the Award Entry Utility and NOT make any updates

title: Award Entry Permissions -BOC EDIT
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a an MJC BOC Edit account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Award Entry
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to view the Award Entry Utility and make any updates

title: Award Entry Permissions- Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a Club account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Major Contract dashboard
custom_expected: THEN they will not be able to see the Award Entry tab

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions- BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a MJC BOC account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Agent/Agency Tab
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to view the tab

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions- Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a MJC Club account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Utilities dashboard
custom_expected: THEN they will NOT be able to view the Agent/Agency tab

title: View Awards in a player's history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Player History of a Pro Player
custom_steps: WHEN the Player has received an award
custom_expected:
THEN the award will appear in the player history 
AND "Considered For" appears followed by "
AND League Award Name - Position: POS Votes: # Place: #*" as an entry in the Player History for any player that was listed in the Award Entry Utility. (EX: Considered for AL All Star Election Award - Position: DH Votes: 1 Place: 1)
AND Ideally if there is no league associated w/ the award it would just not show AL or NL - though ebis1 says "Null" so that's OK if that's easiest.  AND Date is the date the award entry was saved. 
AND Code is Award
AND This entry is not a hyperlink and is all black.
